snippet: The hostages, two Russian steel plant workers and an Italian citizen, were kidnapped by rebels in December as they traveled from Homs to a Russian base at the port of Tartus.
lead_paragraph: The hostages, two Russian steel plant workers and an Italian citizen, were kidnapped by rebels in December as they traveled from Homs to a Russian base at the port of Tartus.

headline.seo: Syrian Rebels Free 3 Hostages in Exchange for Captured Fighters
